snippet.title: Backrooms: Escape Together Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play Backrooms: Escape Together on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/2141730/Backrooms_Escape_Together/

Backrooms: Escape Together is a horrifyingly visually lifelike 1-6 player co-op survival horror made in Unreal Engine 5. Explore 7 procedurally generated levels that host liminal environments, puzzles, and entities with new levels and content added regularly. You are at the mercy of what's lurking and must do whatever it takes to escape.

BET is the most realistic multiplayer dreamcore backrooms horror game to date while still capturing the liminal feel of lower quality backrooms adaptations such as garrys mod, rec room backrooms, or vrchat backrooms. The optional VHS camera is the cherry on top for the ultimate backrooms found footage experience. Navigate popular backrooms levels such as level run and level 0 while avoiding various creatures and entities. Level Fun is also soon to come in the next update of Backrooms: Escape Together.
